articles.author: Rhea Mogul, Sophia Saifi
articles.title: Pakistan claims it has ‘credible intelligence’ India will strike within 36 hours - CNN
articles.description: Tensions between India and Pakistan have escalated further after a top Pakistani official claimed early Wednesday to have “credible intelligence” that New Delhi will carry out a military action against Islamabad within the next two days.
